name: Water is Wet
body:
### About
I'm water resources engineer working in Portland, OR. 
I enjoy building scientific tools in python, cycling, and playing drums.

### Open Source Libraries
#### Paramnormal
Hopefully, a less confusing API to `scipy.stats.distributions`

http://phobson.github.io/paramnormal/

#### mpl-probscale
Use probability scales in matplotlib

http://phobson.github.io/mpl-probscale/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
